entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Apsley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 08:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %

Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: NNE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
